history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01177
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8492, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL MUSEUM SYSTEM, PROVIDING FOR ITS PERMANENT HOME AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CAYETANO, PIA
DATE FILED : 2016-07-05
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. De Venecia (029 2016-09-29)2. Belaro (018 2017-09-05)
3. Belmonte (R.) (000 2017-12-11)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-14
          -Sent to the National Museum for comment.
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2016-10-10
      3. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2016-10-10
          -Matrix of measures for consolidation and for comment was sent to the National Historical Commission of the Philippines, Civil Service Commission, Department of Budget and Management, LGU Manila, PAGCOR, PCSO, Dept. of Tourism, Dept. of Science and Technology, Dept. of Finance, National Museum, and National Commission for Culture and the Arts
      4. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-08-29
      5. Under study by the Technical Working Group(TWG) on 2017-08-29
      6. Recommendations submitted by the TWG on 2017-11-20
      7. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-12-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2016-08-01
